short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension captures information while browsing the official website for viewing characters info and load dumps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension captures information from the official website when the user is viewing their character. Users can later view the character information through the extension and download the data as a single file for further use.

The character's portrait will be outlined in green if the character's data has been successfully added to the plugin's database.

Please note:
This is a fan-made, unofficial browser extension. All rights to the original content belong to COGNOSPHERE. This extension is not officially supported or endorsed by COGNOSPHERE.

Important Notice: 
Currently, HSR-Ext only functions if the interface language on the game website is set to English. We plan to add support for other languages and missing sets in future updates. Please stay tuned for improvements!
